TopicTitle: I need help creating new explosions

Articles.Content: Hi, I'm trying to make a new BDAc Add-on for KSP 1.4.5. I need to create explosion effects, but don't know where to start. The explosion will be used for air detonating shells, and the models included in BDAc aren't suitable for what I'm trying to acomplish, so I need to make my own explosions. Any help would greatly be appreciated.
